name: The Shadow Stone Chronicles: Skybound War
name_original: The Shadow Stone Chronicles: Skybound War
description: A Strategy RPG set on the continent of Parthenion, a land that is being engulfed in war. You play as Prince Erek Belvar of Marithomb, a young man who is driven out of his home by an invasion set in motion by Emperor Rathos of Nargelion. Erek will have to gather allies and prepare for war with the most powerful military force on the continent if he wants to save his homeland from the fires of terrible war.
